duties_responsibilities.duty: Educate and advise homeowners on the benefits of switching to solar energy and the financial savings associated with it.
Utilize a 'soft sell' approach to engage customers and generate sales leads without door knocking or cold calling.
Participate in a FREE warm market lead generation system to generate referrals and sales opportunities.
Provide virtual assistance and support to homeowners in both English and Spanish languages.
Participate in a 'earn while you learn' solar trainee program to gain certification and start making money immediately.
Contribute to a high level of customer satisfaction by ensuring honest and ambition representation of the company and its products.
